attributes.action: Referendum - Assisted Suicide / Assisted Dying - A Referendum is required.
attributes.additional_details: Simple referendum is needed. It is not urgent for Parliament to make this at this time. The UK needs a full referendum with the benefits and the negatives. It should not be rushed through as otherwise it insults all Abrahamic religions.
attributes.background: The UK Parliament does not have the jurisdiction over Christian belief.  Only the full population of the UK have the right to determine who should have assisted dying / assisted suicide and whether it is acceptable by the UK population itself. This should not be left to 400MPs.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

We are petitioning for a National Referendum on Assisted Dying - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701838
